snippet: As jury selection in George Zimmerman’s murder trial began, lawyers from both sides sought to gauge prospective jurors’ exposure to the widespread coverage of the case.
abstract: First round of jury selection in murder trial of George Zimmerman begins, as lawyers from both sides seek to gauge prospective jurors' exposure to widespread coverage of case and their sensitivity to racial furor it unleashed; Zimmerman is charged with shooting death of unarmed black teenager Trayvon Martin in Florida.
lead_paragraph: As jury selection in George Zimmerman’s murder trial began, lawyers from both sides sought to gauge prospective jurors’ exposure to the widespread coverage of the case.

headline.main: Jury Selection in the Trayvon Martin Case Gets Off to a Slow Start
headline.print_headline: Jury Selection in the Trayvon Martin Case Gets Off to a Slow Start
